alert.note: Alert for Essex; King and Queen; Richmond; Westmoreland (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 29 at 2:58PM EDT until July 29 at 3:15PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 315 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL KING AND QUEEN...CENTRAL RICHMOND...SOUTHEASTERN WESTMORELAND AND SOUTHEASTERN ESSEX COUNTIES... At 258 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Warsaw to near Stevensville, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. These severe storms will be near... Warsaw around 305 PM EDT. Haynesville around 315 PM EDT. Sharps and Hague around 320 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Laneview, Howertons, Wellford, Ethel, Threeway, Upright, Bowlers Wharf, Ino, Walkerton and Montague. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Essex; King and Queen; Richmond; Westmoreland
